mean_cn: v. 使负担过重，使过劳；  n. 过重的负担，地表土
mean_en: to give (someone or something) too much work, worry, etc. :to burden (someone or something) too much
word_etyma: over超过 + burden负担 → overburden 使负担过重
sentence: The man is financially overburdened; there's no way he can pay for his house.
sentence_trans: 这个男人财务负担过重了；他没法还清房款。
